sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card>
      <v-card-title class="bg-surface-light pt-4">
      </v-card-title>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-card-text>
        <v-form ref="form" v-model="valid">
          <v-container>
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12">
                <v-text-field color="primary" variant="underlined" v-model="localReceipt.datE_PURCHASE"
                mask="##/##/####" placeholder="dd/mm/yyyy" :rules="[rules.required]" label="Fecha de compra" required />
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-container>
        </v-form>
      </v-card-text>
      <v-col xs12 sm12 md12 lg12 xl12>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-btn color="blue" dark class="mb-2" elevation="4" @click="saveReceipt" :disabled="!valid">Guardar</v-btn>
          <v-btn color="red" dark class="mb-2"  elevation="4" @click="close">Cancelar</v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-col>
    </v-card>
</template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    props: {
      modelValue: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: true,
      },
      receipt: {
        type: Object,
        default: () => ({ pK_RECEIPT: null, datE_PURCHASE: '' }),
      },
    },
    data() {
      return {
        valid: false,
        localReceipt: { ...this.receipt },
        rules: {
          required: (value) => !!value || 'Este campo es requerido.',
        },
      };
    },
    watch: {
      receipt: {
        handler(newReceipt) {
          this.localReceipt = { ...newReceipt };
        },
        deep: true,
      },
    },
    methods: {
      close() {
        this.isOpen = false;
      },
      async saveReceipt() {
        if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
          try {
            await this.$store.dispatch('goodsreceipt/createReceipt', { ...this.localReceipt });
            this.$emit('saved', { ...this.localReceipt });
            this.close();
          } catch (error) {
            console.error('Error al guardar la entrada:', error);
          }
        }
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
